meanings.definition: A person or thing that reduces something in size, quantity, or value.
meanings.sent1: The reductors in the factory helped decrease waste production.
meanings.sent2: She used the reductors to minimize the expenses of the project.
meanings.sent3: The reductors at the party made sure everyone took smaller portions of cake.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor acted as a reductor, calming down the tense situation.
meanings.sent5: The reductors in the story made the treasure hunt more exciting by limiting the clues.
